vlive.korean: 사륜구동 이런 것도 탔고. I also rode a four-wheel-drive car. 듣기 View video KNK : 지금 크나큰(KNK)은?
vlive.english: I also rode a four-wheel-drive car.

vlive.korean: 뒷바퀴에 전달하는 구동 원리가 기본적인 자전거의 형태입니다. And the back wheels move. That is the basic structure. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just one 10 minutes
vlive.english: And the back wheels move. That is the basic structure.
